Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2011 11:13PM acadia wrote: I hope all went smooth & that the one night in helped. How are you this week?  I still think it should be two nights in, all involved need to experience going home so soon after surgery. I had surgery at that hospital long ago, Dr. SS.Take care.
